root: ^ahhgahh..! How do you run so fast? That's what you get for rushing!
^The fog is suffocating you. Hold on, let me try something...
^Deep breaths, take your time. This is no ordinary fog---it must be the Big Tree's doing.
^The Big Tree... I think I've seen it from the city before.
^Of course. It towers over the entire forest, and you can see it from miles away.
^Well, which way is it from here?
^If I were you, I would climb to the top of the forest and look around. As a soul, though, I can feel its energy from that direction. It’s the most powerful soul in the forest.
^Yeah, there's nothing around here that really comes close to the amount of pure energy contained in that tree.
^That being said though, I can feel the presence of corrupted souls nearby.
